Class HeatTransfer

java.lang.Object
org.jscience.physics.classical.thermodynamics.HeatTransfer
public class HeatTransfer extends Object
Heat transfer calculations. * @author Silvere Martin-Michiellot

  • Constructor Details

    • HeatTransfer

      public HeatTransfer()

  • Method Details

    • conduction

      public static double conduction(double k, double area, double deltaT, double thickness)
      Conductive heat transfer (Fourier's law). Q = k * A * ΔT / d
      Parameters:
      k - Thermal conductivity (W/(m·K))
      area - Cross-sectional area (m²)
      deltaT - Temperature difference (K)
      thickness - Material thickness (m)
      Returns:
      Heat transfer rate (W)

    • convection

      public static double convection(double h, double area, double deltaT)
      Convective heat transfer (Newton's law of cooling). Q = h * A * (T_s - T_∞)
      Parameters:
      h - Heat transfer coefficient (W/(m²·K))
      area - Surface area (m²)
      deltaT - Temperature difference (K)
      Returns:
      Heat transfer rate (W)

    • radiation

      public static double radiation(double emissivity, double area, double T1, double T2)
      Radiative heat transfer (Stefan-Boltzmann law). Q = ε * σ * A * (T₁⁴ - T₂⁴)
      Parameters:
      emissivity - Surface emissivity (0-1)
      area - Surface area (m²)
      T1 - Hot surface temperature (K)
      T2 - Cold surroundings temperature (K)
      Returns:
      Heat transfer rate (W)

    • thermalResistanceConduction

      public static double thermalResistanceConduction(double thickness, double k, double area)
      Thermal resistance for conduction. R = d / (k * A)

    • thermalResistanceConvection

      public static double thermalResistanceConvection(double h, double area)
      Thermal resistance for convection. R = 1 / (h * A)

    • overallHeatTransferCoefficient

      public static double overallHeatTransferCoefficient(double h1, double h2, double[] thicknesses, double[] conductivities)
      Overall heat transfer coefficient for composite wall. 1/U = 1/h₁ + Σ(d_i/k_i) + 1/h₂

    • lmtd

      public static double lmtd(double deltaT1, double deltaT2)
      Log Mean Temperature Difference (LMTD) for heat exchangers. LMTD = (ΔT₁ - ΔT₂) / ln(ΔT₁/ΔT₂)

    • heatExchangerEffectiveness

      public static double heatExchangerEffectiveness(double NTU, double capacityRatio)
      Heat exchanger effectiveness (NTU method). ε = 1 - exp(-NTU) for C_min/C_max = 0

    • biotNumber

      public static double biotNumber(double h, double characteristicLength, double k)
      Biot number: ratio of convection to conduction. Bi = h * L_c / k Bi invalid input: '<' 0.1 allows lumped capacitance analysis

    • fourierNumber

      public static double fourierNumber(double thermalDiffusivity, double time, double length)
      Fourier number: dimensionless time for transient conduction. Fo = α * t / L²

    • nusseltDittusBoelter

      public static double nusseltDittusBoelter(double Re, double Pr, boolean heating)
      Nusselt number for turbulent flow in a pipe (Dittus-Boelter). Nu = 0.023 * Re^0.8 * Pr^n
